text: Richard Phillips (born May 16, 1955) is an American merchant mariner and author. He served as captain of the MV Maersk Alabama during its hijacking by Somali pirates in April 2009. He was played by Tom Hanks in the 2013 movie Captain Phillips. Phillips was born in Winchester, Massachusetts. He was raised in Vermont. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Vermont Category:People from Winchester, Massachusetts Category:American sailors
title: Richard Phillips
